block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Enjoy this love Simple Unicorn designed by Perry Bailey. The designer kindly offered this design to Creative Commons. This is very generous of the designer. learn how to fold this simple origami unicorn from the original designer by following the original diagram. You could find the original diagram from the designer using the link below: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/2a/e5/b2/2ae5b215476496f342433dd0fea271d7.jpg Enjoy and Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
